content: tis the season for cozy mornings hot cocoa and all things merry and bright what better way to add a little extra cheer to your holiday table than with my crochet christmas tree coaster pattern **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream yarn - sage green ▢lily sugar n cream yarn - warm brown ▢lily sugar n cream yarn - yellow ▢5 mm hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** chains - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
